title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: An unexpected obstacle is merely an unrevealed opportunity. However, only time will allow you to see this magic in action. When you have a clear sense of where you want to go, any obstruction or detour can be an invitation to discover a better route to success. Pursue your path and resist your first impulse to wrestle down a problem quickly today. Your creativity will rise to the challenge if you let it. Roman emperor Marcus Aurelius wrote, The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
